nodes.bodyText: So it silently fails if an attempt is made to addCookie during an INCLUDE?
Yep, that's what the spec wants us to do, ignore it. All of the other api methods that add headers do the same isMutable() test and ignore if an include.

Yeah, typical strange spec behavior.
Can we (jetty) at least offer debug messages for those that are attempting to troubleshoot why their application isn't behaving like they expect?

Don't worry about the debug thing on this PR.
I've opened issue #4916 to address this in a more consistent way.
